description.value:
Ornaments contained with the blood of the wearer, or simply jewelled or crystalline representations of such. Usually worn around the neck. When spending a Fate Point to gain a bonus on a test, gain +13 rather than +10.

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Blood Angels

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
description.summary: Ornaments contained with the blood of the wearer, or simply jewelled or crystalline representations of such. Usually worn around the neck. When spending a Fate Point to gain a bonus on a test, gain +1

system.effect: Ornaments contained with the blood of the wearer, or simply jewelled or crystalline representations of such. Usually worn around the neck. When spending a Fate Point to gain a bonus on a test, gain +13 rather than +10.
